summary:
A Small adjustment to the Lighting in the Main Severn manor Bedroom.
Also adds a chest for materials beside the forge.
descriptionHtml:
A Small adjustment to the Lighting in the Main Severn manor Bedroom. 
Also adds a chest for materials beside the forge, enchanting table and alchemy station. 

Requires DragonBorn DLC

Also Available on the Steam Workshop:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=128851335

V 1.0 - Initial release 

V1.1 - Added Chests to the Enchanting and Alchemy areas. 

Side Note: 
For those who asked to make the House companion compatable I apologise as after doing some research I found that you can not make it spouse friendly without causing problems for other mods and custom player houses. as the list of houses usable for spouses is all one list and would overwrite any other list that uses that script, and since i don\'t know how to scrpit, i don\'t know how to add it to the games list. Apologies.
author: Restredainted
